header.rec_loc: At a local seaside restaurant in North Cyprus
header.topics: Our life experiences and the jobs weâ€™ve had.
header.activity: Some new acquaintances having coffee on a Sunday morning.
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, advising, requesting, inviting, anecdote telling, telling jokes

speaker.fls: French -- level unspecified; German -- level unspecified
